name: 1.20 "Someone Single, Someone Blue" Quiz | Television | 10 Questions

questions.text: What song did Glenn know all the words to?
questions.explanation:
Bonanaza.

	Glenn was played by Paul Wilson in the first season. He later played Paul in the later seasons. Paul Wilson was born December 25, 1945 in Minnesota.

questions.text: Who said he was now "begging for a job"?
questions.explanation:
Norm.

	Norm had been looking for a job for a long time. Unable to find one, he was starting to get desperate.

Glynis Johns.

	Glynis Johns was born October 5, 1923 in South Africa. She played Mrs. Banks in the movie "Mary Poppins".

Read.

	Coach said his other nickname was "Read" because he "read a book". Mrs. Chambers did not know what to think of Coach or the other people at Cheers for that matter.

questions.text: Why did Diane's mom come to see Diane?
questions.correct: She needed Diane to get married.
options: She was in town on business.
They had a dinner date together.
questions.explanation:
She needed Diane to get married.

	Diane's dad put a clause in the will that if Diane was not married by a certain date, Diane's mother would lose all her money. Diane never wanted her parents' money but her mom was used to living rich.

questions.text: What was the name of Diane's mother's chauffeur?
questions.explanation:
Boggs.

	Boggs was played by Duncan Ross. Ross was born on August 25, 1918 and died January 4, 1987.

questions.text: Who did Carla say Diane "had the hots for"?
questions.explanation:
Sam.

	There had always been this chemistry between Sam and Diane. Some thought Diane liked Sam, while others thought Sam liked Diane.

questions.text: Sam said that he learned long ago "never to trust anyone wearing a wedding dress, especially ____" who?
questions.explanation:
A woman.

	Sam was married once before to a woman named Debbie. He told Diane she didn't know what a wedding did to a person.

questions.text: Was there ever a wedding at Cheers up to this point in the series (not necessarily shown on the TV)?
questions.explanation:
Yes.

	Coach told the barflies how Franky and Janet got married at the bar. Then he went on to tell them how Janet caught Franky cheating on her at Cheers as well. And then she shot him dead also at Cheers, where his ashes were now kept.

questions.text: Did Sam and Diane get married?
questions.explanation:
No.

	Diane's mother called it off because they were making a mockery of marriage. When Boggs found out that Mrs. Chambers would lose her money he offered to marry her. He had been extorting money from them for the last 25 years so he was now wealthy.
